description: If you use a whole fish, you can use the bones to make a fish stock for poaching But fillets can also be poached in a lighter broth They are rubbed with a Middle Eastern spice mix.
title: Cold Poached Pacific Cod with Spices
title_page: Cold Poached Pacific Cod with Spices Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
If you use a whole fish, you can use the bones to make a fish stock for poaching. But fillets can also be poached in a lighter broth. They are rubbed with a Middle Eastern spice mix.
Featured in: Cool Summer Fish.
